meanings.definition: The berry-like fruit of the elder tree, used in making wine and jelly.
meanings.sent1: I picked some elderberries to make delicious jelly.
meanings.sent2: The elderberry wine was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the elderberries for a secret jelly-making project.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and vibrant as the elderberry jelly.
meanings.sent5: The elderberry's deep purple color made it stand out in the garden.

meanings.definition: A shrub or small tree of the honeysuckle family, bearing elderberries.
meanings.sent1: The elderberry bush in our backyard attracts many birds.
meanings.sent2: I love the fragrance of elderberry flowers in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The elderberry tree whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like elderberries in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The elderberry bush swayed gently in the breeze, a peaceful sight.
